TestInfo.name: ForwardSamplingStrategy
TestInfo.author: mturkmen
TestInfo.description: This input finds the optimized desings in a single fuel channel of molten salt reactor by using the grid technique as one of the forward sampling methods.

revisions.revision: modified file to create machine-learning-enabled msr core design
